definitions.definition: in a way that says what you think is bad about somebody/something

examples.text: She spoke critically of her father.

definitions.definition: in a way that is extremely important because a future situation will be affected by it
in a way that is serious, uncertain and possibly dangerous

examples.text: He is **critically ill** in intensive care.

definitions.definition: in a way that involves making fair, careful judgements about the good and bad qualities of somebody/something

examples.text: I looked at myself critically in the mirror.

definitions.definition: in a way that is connected with the judgement of critics of art, music, literature, etc.
